author: Bing Team
title: IndexNow - Celebrating two years of growth!
abstract: Whether you have a blog, a large e-commerce website, or any website, IndexNow can help you reach more potential customers by getting your content indexed fast in search engines. Learn how.
body: Two years ago, IndexNow embarked on a journey with a simple ambition: Make it easy for websites to reflect their content changes (add, update, delete) quickly in all Search Engines. Today, we stand i… [+547 chars]

author: Bing Team
title: Another Grey Matter ISV Partner Day is a wrap!
abstract: This fantastic in-person event presents a unique opportunity to network with Microsoft speakers, as well as experts from the Grey Matter team and representatives from some of our most in-demand partners.
body: Grey Matter, a Value Added Reseller for Bing Maps, hosts an annual ISV Partner Day event to showcase the latest Microsoft technologies in front of hundreds of ISVs through breakthrough workshops and … [+2208 chars]
